name: prettyprintcode
description: Combining vscode-print and markdown-to-pdf to print in the most efficient and pretty way

prettyprintcode.ignore.description: Glob patterns for files and folders to ignore during print

prettyprintcode.fontSize.description: Font size to use on the print

prettyprintcode.showLineNumbers.description: Show manual line numbers alongside rendered code blocks.

prettyprintcode.documentHeader.markdownDescription: HTML template rendered before each file's content. Placeholders: `{{displayPath}}`, `{{relativePath}}`, `{{fileName}}`, `{{parentDirectory}}` and their `raw` variants.

prettyprintcode.documentFooter.markdownDescription: HTML template rendered after each file's content. Supports the same placeholders as `prettyprintcode.documentHeader`.

prettyprintcode.headerFooterStyles.markdownDescription: CSS appended to the generated `<style>` tag. Useful for styling elements emitted by the document header/footer templates.

prettyprintcode.codeThemePreset.markdownDescription: Select one of the built-in Prism themes for styling code blocks.

prettyprintcode.codeThemeCustomUrl.markdownDescription: Optional `https://` URL to a custom Prism CSS file. When set, overrides the preset selection.

prettyprintcode.codeTheme.markdownDescription: Prism theme name (for example `prism`, `prism-tomorrow`, `prism-okaidia`) or a full `https://` URL to a custom Prism CSS file.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
